cheatsheet.title: View the UI overview in the Help

intro.description: That's the end of the guided tour. We hope it's been very helpful to you.

item.title: View the help guide
item.description: Just so you know, in addition to these cheat sheets, Debrief has an extensive user guide that you can use; but, next we're going to go over other features in the user interface. NoPrintSo, click on the help link alongside or below to open the help manual, read about the Debrief UI, then come back to this cheat sheet.NoPrint
